reviewText: for a dvd that is advertised as Hitler's fascination with the Spear, and the Grail, only about 1 minute, each, is is devoted to them; while PLENTY of time and information is given to the Swastika and the occult. Little is mentioned about his interest in  the Holy artifacts [ which drove him ]. I have other discs that are MUCH more informative. since there is no information on the back of the case, Amazon cannot be totally to blame.
